org.bitbucket.calvinmwhu.chess.game

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bitbucket.calvinmwhu.chess.game.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Game backend model, for storing chessBoard, pieces, and players data.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Game.GameAction
      GameAction class for define game object for easy undo operation

      constructor, creates an empty game, gives the turn to white player
